text: @IvankaTrump What in the actual fuck are you talking about?  People had jobs.  Restaurants, schools, healthcare...people had jobs.  Jobs that paid them.  Then, COVID19 happened, and the inept administration didn't do what needed to be done.  Something new won't help IF YOU CAN'T GO TO WORK.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
